title: ClickTight Convertibles: Opening the ClickTight Panel
description: How to open the ClickTight panel on the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to open the ClickTight panel on the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles
